humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes (pNO(0/13)), and all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on New Rule 10, New Rule 11, and Rule 2, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pNO(0/13)' in the tumor classification indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the 13 lymph nodes that were examined. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
